General.Name: SIASUN Robot Automation Co
General.Description: Siasun Robot&Automation Co.,Ltd. operates in robotic industry in China and internationally. The company offers collaborative, mobile, intelligent, industrial, and service robots; chassis marriage and assembly AGV, spot welding, and intelligent logistic systems; AS/RS systems; electronics assembly systems; automated vertical warehouse systems; and automated charging and swapping systems. It serves automobile, chemical, electronics, traffic, and other industries. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenyang, China.
